title.narrative: Study on Access to Water in Africa

description.narrative: The objective of the assignment is to provide updated knowledge on experiences with providing development support for access to clean water in Africa. The study will take stock with respect to knowledge input of relevance for the Government’s 4 years plan to provide clean water for people in Africa, as well as serve as input for future evaluative work. The study will look into existing documentation (evaluations, relevant synthesis papers etc.) and will have special focus on the experiences and lessons learned from Danish interventions and the involvement of the Danish knowledge base. Special attention will be given to the poverty and health focus of interventions and rural water supply and water resource management, including nature based solutions (NbS) and new technology.
